Summary: Prolonged sighting by many in W. Des Moines, IA.
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in West Des Moines
There were no other sightings in West Des Moines on or around July 4th 2000
divs: Sighting DetailsSurrounding the period of scheduled 4th of July fireworks in the area, at least70 people in the West Des Moines vicinity contacted the IA state directorregarding a bright red object moving very slowly on a general W to E course atconsiderable height but below the 8,000-foot broken clouds. It made periodicdirectional turns to the NW, N, NE, E and S, twice ejecting a small red lightwhich descended quickly then made a right-angle turn laterally. Individualssighted the main object from 10 minutes to over half an hour. Some described arounded cylinder or oval shape with a vertical attitude.
